item.title: quote of the day
item.description: Be Alert! - the world needs more Lerts.

item.title: Thought of the Day
item.description: “Arguing with religious people – It’s like playing chess with a pigeon; no matter how good I am at chess, the pigeon is just going to knock over the pieces, crap on the board and strut around victorious” – Anonymous

item.title: Joe on Sporty-ball-z
item.description: For every nerd calling something sportsball there needs to be a jock that walks into a library and yells “WHAT’S UP WITH ALL THESE WORD BURGERS”
